title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint, cancelling the process does not have any effect.
OB: When trying to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog immediately closes without any action. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request.
EB: When cancelling the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog should close immediately and the exception list should not appear. Additionally, the cancel button should either be disabled or the cancellation request should be honored. To achieve this, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, false should be passed for the `cancellable` parameter.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Go to the breakpoints menu
3. Click on 'Add Exception Breakpoint'
4. While the progress dialog is shown, click on the cancel button
5. Observe that the progress dialog closes immediately
6. Observe that the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request
